summary.span: 提供将数据置于系统剪贴板中以及从中检索数据的方法。

span.span: Provides methods to place data on and retrieve data from the system Clipboard.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关要用于类的预定义格式的列表 ，请参见 类。For a list of predefined formats to use with the class, see the class. 调用将 数据放置在剪贴板上，并替换其当前内容。Call to put data on the Clipboard, replacing its current contents. 若要在剪贴板上放置数据的持久性副本，请将 `copy` 参数设置为 `true` 。To place a persistent copy of the data on the Clipboard, set the `copy` parameter to `true`. > [!NOTE] > 若要以多种格式将数据置于剪贴板中，请使用 类或 实现。To place data on the Clipboard in multiple formats, use the class or an implementation. 将数据置于剪贴板中的多种格式，以最大程度地提高可能不知道其格式要求的目标应用程序可以成功检索数据的可能性。Place data on the Clipboard in multiple formats to maximize the possibility that a target application, whose format requirements you might not know, can successfully retrieve the data. 调用 以从剪贴板检索数据。Call to retrieve data from the Clipboard. 数据返回为实现接口的对象 。The data is returned as an object that implements the interface. 使用中指定的方法 和中的字段 从对象中提取数据。Use the methods specified by and fields in to extract the data from the object. 如果您不知道您检索的数据的格式，请调用接口的 方法， 以获取存储数据的所有格式的列表。If you do not know the format of the data you retrieved, call the method of the interface to get a list of all formats that data is stored in. 然后调用 接口的方法 ，并指定应用程序可以使用的格式。Then call the method of the interface, and specify a format that your application can use. 在 .NET Framework 2.0 中， 类提供附加方法，使系统剪贴板更易于使用。In .NET Framework 2.0, the class provides additional methods that make it easier to work with the system Clipboard. 调用 方法以从剪贴板中删除所有数据。Call the method to remove all data from the Clipboard. 若要向剪贴板添加特定格式的数据，并替换现有数据，请调用相应的 `Set` *格式* 方法（如 ），或调用 方法来指定格式。To add data of a particular format to the Clipboard, replacing the existing data, call the appropriate `Set`*Format* method, such as , or call the method to specify the format. 若要从剪贴板检索特定格式的数据，请首先调用适当的 `Contains` *格式* 方法 (如 ) 方法来确定剪贴板是否包含该格式的数据，然后调用适当的 `Get` *格式* 方法 (例如 ) 检索数据（如果剪贴板包含数据）。To retrieve data of a particular format from the Clipboard, first call the appropriate `Contains`*Format* method (such as ) method to determine whether the Clipboard contains data in that format, and then call the appropriate `Get`*Format* method (such as ) to retrieve the data if the Clipboard contains it. 若要指定这些操作中的格式，请 改为调用和 方法。To specify the format in these operations, call the and methods instead. > [!NOTE] > 所有基于 Windows 的应用程序共享系统剪贴板，因此当你切换到另一个应用程序时，内容可能会更改。All Windows-based applications share the system Clipboard, so the contents are subject to change when you switch to another application. > > 对象必须是可序列化的，才能将其放在剪贴板上。An object must be serializable for it to be put on the Clipboard. 如果将非序列化对象传递到剪贴板方法，则该方法将失败，且不会引发异常。If you pass a non-serializable object to a Clipboard method, the method will fail without throwing an exception. 有关序列化的详细信息，请参阅。See for more information on serialization. 如果目标应用程序需要非常具体的数据格式，则在序列化过程中添加到数据的标头可能会阻止应用程序识别数据。If your target application requires a very specific data format, the headers added to the data in the serialization process may prevent the application from recognizing your data. 若要保留数据格式，请将数据作为 数组添加到， 并将传递 给 方法。To preserve your data format, add your data as a array to a and pass the to the method. > > 类只能在设置为单线程单元 (STA) 模式的线程中使用。The class can only be used in threads set to single thread apartment (STA) mode. 若要使用此类，请确保使用 `Main` 特性标记方法 。To use this class, ensure that your `Main` method is marked with the attribute. > > 使用带有剪贴板的图元文件格式时，可能需要特别注意。Special considerations may be necessary when using the metafile format with the Clipboard. 由于类的当前实现中存在限制，因此 使用较旧的图元文件格式的应用程序可能无法识别 .NET Framework 使用的图元文件格式。Due to a limitation in the current implementation of the class, the metafile format used by the .NET Framework may not be recognized by applications that use an older metafile format. 在这种情况下，必须与 Win32 剪贴板应用程序编程接口) (Api 进行互操作。In this case, you must interoperate with the Win32 Clipboard application programming interfaces (APIs). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 方法将数据放置在系统剪贴板上并从中检索数据。The following code example uses methods to place data on and retrieve it from the system Clipboard. 此代码假定 `button1` `button2` 已创建、、和， `textBox1` `textBox2` 并将其放置在窗体上。This code assumes `button1`, `button2`, `textBox1`, and `textBox2` have been created and placed on the form. `button1_Click`方法调用 从文本框中选择文本并将其放入系统剪贴板。The `button1_Click` method calls to take selected text from the text box and place it on the system Clipboard. `button2_Click`方法调用 从系统剪贴板检索数据。The `button2_Click` method calls to retrieve data from the system Clipboard. 此代码使用 和 提取返回的数据，并在中显示数据 `textBox2` 。The code uses and to extract the data returned and displays the data in `textBox2`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于剪贴板由多个进程共享，因此调用此方法可能会影响这些进程。Because the Clipboard is shared by multiple processes, calling this method may have an impact on those processes. > [!NOTE] > 类只能在设置为单线程单元 (STA) 模式的线程中使用。The class can only be used in threads set to single thread apartment (STA) mode. 若要使用此类，请确保使用 `Main` 特性标记方法 。To use this class, ensure that your `Main` method is marked with the attribute. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了此成员。The following example demonstrates this member. remarks.format: ## Remarks 类包含可用于此方法的预定义格式名称。The class contains pre-defined format names that you can use with this method. 使用此方法来确定剪贴板是否包含指定格式的数据或兼容的格式，然后再使用方法检索数据 。Use this method to determine whether the Clipboard contains data in the specified format or a compatible format before retrieving it with the method. > [!NOTE] > 如果数据已存储，则可以将其转换为另一种格式，这种格式指定允许该转换，并且请求的格式与存储格式兼容。Data can be converted to another format if it was stored specifying that conversion is allowed, and if the requested format is compatible with the stored format. 例如，以 Unicode 形式存储的数据可以转换为文本。For example, data stored as Unicode can be converted to text. > > 类只能在设置为单线程单元 (STA) 模式的线程中使用。The class can only be used in threads set to single thread apartment (STA) mode. 若要使用此类，请确保使用 `Main` 特性标记方法 。To use this class, ensure that your `Main` method is marked with the attribute. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了此成员。The following example demonstrates this member. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当应用程序退出时，将从系统剪贴板中删除数据。Data will be deleted from system Clipboard when the application exits. 此方法尝试以100毫秒间隔将数据设置为十次，并在 所有尝试均失败时引发。This method attempts to set the data ten times in 100-millisecond intervals, and throws an if all attempts are unsuccessful. > [!NOTE] > 对象必须是可序列化的，才能将其放在剪贴板上。An object must be serializable for it to be put on the Clipboard. 如果将不可序列化的对象传递给此方法，则它将失败，且不会引发异常。If you pass a non-serializable object to this method, it will fail without throwing an exception. 有关序列化的详细信息，请参阅。See for more information on serialization. > > 类只能在设置为单线程单元 (STA) 模式的线程中使用。The class can only be used in threads set to single thread apartment (STA) mode. 若要使用此类，请确保使用 `Main` 特性标记方法 。To use this class, ensure that your `Main` method is marked with the attribute. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用将非 持久性文本数据置于系统剪贴板上。The following code example uses to place nonpersistent text data onto the system Clipboard. 在 `button1_Click` 方法中，将从剪贴板中复制所选文本 `textBox1` ，并将其粘贴到剪贴板上。In the `button1_Click` method, the selected text is copied from `textBox1` and pasted on the Clipboard. 在 `button2_Click` 方法中，从剪贴板检索信息，并将其显示在中 `textBox2` 。In the `button2_Click` method, the information is retrieved from the Clipboard and displayed in `textBox2`. 此代码假定 `button1` `button2` 已创建、、和， `textBox1` `textBox2` 并将其放置在窗体上。This code assumes `button1`, `button2`, `textBox1`, and `textBox2` have been created and placed on a form. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `copy` 参数为，则在 `false` 应用程序退出时将从系统剪贴板中删除数据。If the `copy` parameter is `false`, the data will be deleted from system Clipboard when the application exits. 此方法尝试以100毫秒间隔将数据设置为十次，并在 所有尝试均失败时引发。This method attempts to set the data ten times in 100-millisecond intervals, and throws an if all attempts are unsuccessful. > [!NOTE] > 对象必须是可序列化的，才能将其放在剪贴板上。An object must be serializable for it to be put on the Clipboard. 如果将不可序列化的对象传递给此方法，则它将失败，且不会引发异常。If you pass a non-serializable object to this method, it will fail without throwing an exception. 有关序列化的详细信息，请参阅。See for more information on serialization. > > 类只能在设置为单线程单元 (STA) 模式的线程中使用。The class can only be used in threads set to single thread apartment (STA) mode. 若要使用此类，请确保使用 `Main` 特性标记方法 。To use this class, ensure that your `Main` method is marked with the attribute. ## Examples 下面的方法在应用程序中运行。The following method is run in an application. 它在系统剪贴板上的文本框中放置所选文本数据的持久性副本。It places a persistent copy of the selected text data in the text box on the system Clipboard. 此代码假定 `button1` `textBox1` 已创建、和， `textBox2` 并将其放置在窗体上。This code assumes `button1`, `textBox1`, and `textBox2` have been created and placed on a form.
